text: Elena Fernández Gómez (8 February 1941 – 3 January 2021), known by the pen name Elena Santiago, was a Spanish writer. She was born in Castile and León, Spain. In 1983, she won the Felipe Trigo Awards. She wrote many Christmas- related children stories. She wrote Cuentos de este siglo, Cien años de cuento, El Faro, Miguel Delibes, and Jorge Guillén. Santiago died at the age of 79 on 3 January 2021 in Valladolid, Spain. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Spanish writers
